wikipedia_page.main: Rafi Razzak (born March 28, 1949) is founder and owner of Centerprise International (CI), a provider of managed IT and system integration services to corporate, government and education customers in the UK. CI claims to be the longest standing Ministry of Defence approved IT supplier in the UK, since 1992.

response: In 2019 the club was forced to relocate to Winchester City's City Ground as former chairman Rafi Razzak attempted to sell the Camrose for development.Basingstoke Town Football club future in doubt over stadium row BBC News, 31 July 2019 In October 2020 the club returned to Basingstoke, at the upgraded FA Winklebury Sports Complex in the Winklebury area of the town.Basingstoke Town to play first Winklebury stadium match TODAY Gazette, 24 October 2020
